messages.content: Only the owner can invite collaborators.

It seems that Bob (the repository owner) needs to invite Alice to the repository as a collaborator since only the owner can do that. If you can communicate with Bob, please ask him to send the invitation to Alice.

Unfortunately, there is no way to accept the invitation on Alice's behalf without having access to her GitHub account. If you have any further instructions or queries, feel free to let me know!
